Package org.catlady.server.game.manager

Class ServerGameManager

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.server.game.manager.BaseGameManager
org.catlady.server.game.manager.ServerGameManager
public class ServerGameManager extends BaseGameManager
Handle the state of the game for the players in a Lobby.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerGameManager

      public ServerGameManager(List<String> playerNames, List<Card> deck, List<CatCard> strayCats)
      Create the game manager and populate the GameMatrix with the first cards.
      Parameters:
      playerNames - all the players in this game
      deck - the list of cards used
      strayCats - the stray cats used
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the population fails, see GameMatrix.populate(java.util.List<org.catlady.server.game.card.Card>) for further details

      Shortcut for getting the current PlayerBoard

      the player board of the current player

    • canPlayCards

      public boolean canPlayCards(List<Card> cards)
      Verify if a list of Card can be played by the current player by checking if the player have them and if it is a valid play in the game.
      Specified by:
      canPlayCards in class BaseGameManager
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to verify
      Returns:
      true if they can be played, false otherwise

    • drawCards

      public void drawCards(RowColumnIdentifier rowColumnIdentifier)
      Draw a row or column of cards from the GameMatrix.
      Parameters:
      rowColumnIdentifier - the row or column to get
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayException - if the cat token is in the same row or column
      IllegalArgumentException - if replace fails, see GameMatrix.replace(org.catlady.server.game.matrix.RowColumnIdentifier, java.util.List<org.catlady.server.game.card.Card>)
      UnknownCardException - if are drew cards nor recognized by the game, see PlayerBoard.handleDrewCards(java.util.List<org.catlady.server.game.card.Card>)

    • playSprayBottle

      public void playSprayBottle(List<Card> cards, RowColumnIdentifier newCatTokenPosition)
      Play a copy of SprayBottleCard if the player have one.
      Parameters:
      newCatTokenPosition - the new position of the cat token
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayException - if the card cannot be played in this state or in this way

    • playLostCatCouple

      public void playLostCatCouple(List<Card> cards, GameAction gameAction, String strayCatName)
      Play two copies of LostCatCard if possible.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to play
      gameAction - the action to execute as a result of the play
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the action is not known by the game
      IllegalPlayException - if the cards cannot be played in this state or in this way
      CardNotFoundException - if game action is GameAction.GET_STRAY_CAT but there are no stray cats available or the requested one is not present

    • removePlayerFromGame

      Description copied from class: BaseGameManager
      Remove a specific player from the current game.
      Overrides:
      removePlayerFromGame in class BaseGameManager
      Parameters:
      player - the player name inside the lobby.

      public boolean allPlayerAreDone()
      Verify if all players has sent their cats for evaluation.
